error.server_error: Server error, please try again later

not_found_page.title: Unfortunately, this page is unavailable.
not_found_page.description: You may have used an invalid link or the page has been removed.

login_page.slogan_1: Register to see $life moments$ of your friends
login_page.slogan_2: Share interesting moments with those who $understand you$
login_page.slogan_3: Check out these $life moments$ shared by close friends

input.avatar_file_type_error: Invalid file type, please use following:
input.avatar_file_dimensions_error_description: should be less than {max}px and larger than {min}px
input.email_error: Pease enter email in correct format
input.fullname_error: Name should contain at least {count} chars
input.phone_error: Pease enter phone in correct format
input.password_error: Password should contain at least {count} letters long, numbers and special characters (!?#)
input.username_error: Username should contain at least {count} chars
input.date_error: You must be at least {count} years old to sign up for Photorama!

tooltip.email: Enter the email address at whitch you ca be contacted. No one will see it on your profile.
tooltip.fullname: Add your name so that your friends can find you.
tooltip.password: Create a password at least {count} letters long numbers and special characters (!?#). It should be something that others cant't guess.
tooltip.birthdate: Use your own date of birth, even if this account for a business, a pet or something else. No one will see this on your profile.
tooltip.username: Add a username or use our suggestion. You can change this at any time.

explore_page.title: Interesting
explore_page.no_topics: There is no related topics yet, $but you can find it$

modal.floating_description: Search for information about what interests you and find new inspiring topics.

terms.signup: By tapping 'I agree', you agree to create an account and to Photorama's Terms, Privacy Policy and Cookie Policy.

signup_page.photo_description: Add a profile picture so what your friends know its you. Everyone will able to see your picture.
signup_page.confirm_title: Agree to Photorama's terms and policies
signup_page.confirm_required_info_title: Oops, it looks like we don't have all the information we need to continue.
signup_page.confirm_required_info_description: Please follow the links below to add info
